body.p: Use the DEVICES screen to show each device in the Color Monitor’s chain. By selecting a device in the list, you can change the generic name (e.g. “PDU”) to a name meaningful to your installation. Accessing the PDU device name is shown below. Settings: PDU Device
To change device parameters on other devices in the PDU, such as panelboards or subfeeds, consult the WaveStar® Color Monitor, Setup and Operation, P-164001109.
